alfredsnippet.snippet:
"What I like about sceptics is that in good science you need critics that make you think: 'Crumbs, have I made a mistake here?' If you don't have that continuously, you really are up the creek ... you need sceptics, especially when the science gets very big and monolithic."

- James Lovelock
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - We Need Skeptics the Most When Science Gets Very Big and Monolithic
